group_1.textCenter: I've never given much thought to marriage…

group_1.textRight: Dang, you don't look so good.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Chizuru. I didn't expect to see you here.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's been a while since we bumped@into each other around these parts.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Indeed.
Hm?

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: You seem to be in low spirits as well.@Did something happen?

group_1.textRight: It's nothing. Just your imagination@running wild.
More importantly, you're obviously feeling@pretty lousy yourself, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: You only saw that because I'd assumed@I was alone.

group_1.textRight: Whatever you say. So what's up?

group_1.textLeft: My training wore me out,@so I went for a walk…

group_1.textRight: I heard you abandoned your training again.

group_1.textLeft: I did not abandon anything.
I focus my energies on what is necessary@rather than trifles.

group_1.textRight: Hmph…
I understand how crucial combat is@to a Battle Shamaness,
but you must prepare yourself for@marriage as well.

group_1.textLeft: With all due respect, Father,
I remain well-versed in poetry, and my works@have strong reception at readings.

group_1.textRight: That's true, but…

group_1.textLeft: I also take pride in my war calculations@being superior to those of our vassals.
I can unerringly predict the cost of whatever@conflicts that may occur.
Furthermore, I can plan marches according@to distance and the movement of the stars!

group_1.textRight: No, Tsuyu… That's not what I'm talking about…

group_1.textLeft: So as you can see, I can be wedded to anyone@without shaming our people―!

group_1.textRight: But you also need to learn the art of tea@and flower arrangement…

group_1.textLeft: I shan't!
Not while our land's children still starve…!

group_1.textRight: …[wait:0.8][chara:832101:lipSynch_1]I see.

group_1.textLeft: …That's why.

group_1.textRight: So you're not playing hooky out of laziness@or anything like that.
I respect that.

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong? You got shy for a moment.
…I knew it. There IS something wrong,@isn't there?

group_1.textRight: Tsuyu…you're doing a lotta things@in order to get married.
Does…an ideal love life really exist…?

group_1.textLeft: No, not truly.
My father shall decide my relationship for me.@It's not something within my control.

group_1.textRight: Yeah…our dads decide these things…

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's how things are.
[chara:104501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
You can't mean…is there someone you're in@love with? Someone from the Taito Gang…?

group_1.textRight: WHAT?!

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell me…is it that bodyguard who's@always following you around?
You mustn't pursue him. He'd be nothing but@a mere mindless hanger-on of a husband.

group_1.textRight: No! Oh my god! That's not it at all!

group_1.textLeft: …It isn't?

group_1.textRight: GAH! This conversation is over!
I feel a Demon lurking around. Let's take@our minds off of this crap!

group_1.textLeft: Alright…
